title: Alex Jones Show - 2011 Apr 29 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Alex Jones Show
Friday, 29 April 2011


[sebaygo1]


Scheduled Guests
................

From the Infowars web site ::

 
Alex welcomes in-studio author, researcher and radio host Webster Griffin Tarpley and the former Director of Advanced Space Programs Development for the U.S. Air Force in the Ford and Carter administrations, and a former United States Air Force Lieutenant Colonel with 101 combat missions, Bob Bowman. Tarpley is the author of Obama: The Postmodern Coup - Making of a Manchurian Candidate, Surviving the Cataclysm: Your Guide Through the Worst Financial Crisis in Human History, and Barack H. Obama: The Unauthorized Biography. Dr. Bowman campaigned nationwide for the nomination of the Reform Party of the United States of America for the presidency in 2000.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
